name: Project Avary
description: Project Avary's mission is to improve life outcomes of children with a parent in prison or jail by providing emotionally and physically safe environments in which they gain a sense of community, increased self-knowledge, and valuable life and leadership skills. We make a long-term commitment to each child, enrolling children from age 8 to 13 and then serving them until age 19.
